name: To the Ground!
description:
Burn down cities across the globe by, quite literally, fanning the flames.

This game was made for Github GameOff 2022, in Unity. Credits are here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lmOSn7B2afdwt2As_9olxGslL6b5zpxnVLgEo4KRe-4/...

The downloadable build is better than the web build, and I would recommend downloading it if you are able. The web build must be played in fullscreen.
